subject: Re: [junit] Hi help regarding JUNIT with XML
msgSnippet: Hi Sudhakar, For testing the XML we are having a seperate package called XMLUnit. Please download this and use. Regards Suresh sudhakar_rsr1
messageBody:
Hi Sudhakar,
For testing the XML we are having a seperate package called XMLUnit. Please download this and use.

Regards
Suresh

sudhakar_rsr1 <sudhakar_rsr1@...> wrote:


Hi friends,

I am just a beginner for JUNIT. Can any body send the examples or
related URL's to test a class using XML as INPUT file rather using
an excel file.

Thanks & Regards
Sudhakar
